lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, two are mysteriously vanished. I think they were mumbling something about trying to find an alley--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, will you stand guard now, because now I have to take a shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been that long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the record, you guys do wait for about an hour and a half, two hours-- no sign of Allison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think we should go back in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't take that long, I think 30 minutes is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, I'm just letting them know. That's how long they would wait before they know that she that she's not coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I guess we'll go back inside, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two more minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Do your business. What--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Head down, huh? Contemplation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you think of our pirate vessel so far, of our pirate mission? Are you having fun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, what was your question?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing, we can go back in--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Release.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where you're supposed to go, god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right back around. Oh, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what do you guys do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to take a night walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Night walk! Night hike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) I want to take a night walk-- that's not a song.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of us together?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's go for a walk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll poke our heads back in and go-- We'll wave them out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The crew should also have some place to sleep. Let's make sure everybody is taken care of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They can go back to the boat, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're having a bad time-- what do you guys want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Orly seems to be playing the mother hen with Marius playing assistant to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mr. Orly, we feel terrible about everything that's going on. We want to make you guys as comfortable as possible through this deeply inconvenient situation we've all found ourselves in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would be lying if it wasn't deeply inconvenient."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Appreciate your honesty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whispering) Ask him about the Diver's Grave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would not be an insult--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hit his hand. High five!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like that-- I know that would be an insult-- but what would not be an-- How many kids are here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we're staying behind, I'd say give me about a hundred gold to watch over the nest around "here. When you return, we'll hopefully-- I understand, perhaps, you m-m-might be coming back "for us?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Without question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then I'll return whatever was not spent."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a good idea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got 50 gold on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll get the other 50.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, kids. We are-- unless something goes tragically wrong-- we expect to be returning, and I imagine you'll hear word if things go tragically wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marius comes over and goes, "Right, now, hoping no tragedy, just come back and get us off "this fucking hell-hole."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, if we don't come back, can't you take the Mistake and go home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you don't come back, I don't know."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long do we expect to be gone for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travel from here to there and back, about four or five days round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two weeks, if we're not back in two weeks--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's two weeks, the ship is yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, I wish you all m-m-much luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I appreciate that. Hopefully you will not have to play a funeral dirge for us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am hoping that is never the case. Guess I'll just make some coin in the interim."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If I may, Orly, you seem to be very familiar with the Diver's Grave and the song. Do you know anything more specific of it and creatures that might be in that area? Things to look out for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, standard deep-ocean folk."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deep-ocean folk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sharks."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Mermaids.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Other underwater beasts."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's a mermaid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps m-m-mermaids and other such dangers."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many teeth does a mermaid have--? What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mermaids are part pretty people and part fish people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Those are both very dangerous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well! Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any good things about the area that you care to share?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably some worthwhile loot there amongst the sediment."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any idea how long ships have been going down in that region?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, a few hundred years, maybe?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A few hundred years? Is there some sort of weather pattern or natural phenomenon that is responsible for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, ships go down all over the coast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there aren't creepy stories about every inch of it, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are quite a number of creepy stories on every part of this here coast."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fair point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you know how deep it is to the bottom there? Is it deep, deep ocean, or just medium-ocean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't say I do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "M-m-my apologies."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for your time, and thank you for your trust.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come back."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Working on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, who are we missing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Night hike. We're all here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you guys wiping your hands on your pants?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Who wants to go explore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go explore!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we looking for? Are we just taking it in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're looking for fresh air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I figured we'll use the night air to our advantage, acclimate a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's take a walk. Let's see what there is to see. I'm excited about this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Learn the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yasha leans in and goes, "If there is any trouble, should I...?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, if there is trouble, let's try and resolve it-- well...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I trust you, just--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gauge it as it comes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell me when you want--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Judge? Will do. It's so intimidating when she says it like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have taken, I'm assuming, a short rest and heal up from my fight while we were all chilling here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should get a wig for the Judge like the Plank King has.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the sword?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: A wig?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sort of like a golf club cover?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like a tea-cozy. A sword-cozy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys leave the tavern.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up away from the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you exit-- Caduceus, you notice this-- but Jester, as everyone's leaving, you to the back of it, you feel a hand grab your arm for a minute. You look over to the side, and you may not have noticed earlier, but Vera had been in the inn, in the tavern vicinity. She pulls you back from the rest of the group for a second and looks you in the eye with this intense stare. You can see the wrinkles on the sides of her face pushing into this tight crow's nest on each side, her irises bloodshot. She goes, "He would not be the first she's left in ruin, and he would not be the "last. I will take care of him if he cannot." She releases you and spins around and walks off to her room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I caught a bit of that, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw them discuss, but you weren't-- At the point of talking and looking, you wouldn't have made out the words necessarily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're pushing midnight, here at Darktow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It smells like poop out here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Checking the bottom of my shoes, like: What did we step in? Why is it--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sea breeze. At night, it's a land-breeze.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I have to stop really quickly and use the bathroom. There's these little outhouses over in the corner right here that drop straight down into the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outhouse, campaign two. Here we go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's like the tower bridge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone on the streets?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, and how well-lit is it out here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, who's watching?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty misty. There are not heavy clouds in the sky, and the moon seems to be not a full moon, but it seems to be fairly bright, but because of the mist, it diffuses. There is this general faint moonlight throughout the entire vicinity of the town. What that does is it makes distant visibility a little harder, much like fog lights at a distance. There are a number of patrolling individuals-- no uniform to them, but they walk around, torch in hand, looking through the streets, keeping an eye. They're armed, armored, but haphazard and no uniform.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the Revelry?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone here seems to be a part of the Revelry-- including yourselves now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep your hands on your coin purses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, if we're going to talk about these things, let's use some code words. Don't say her name, say a different name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiffany.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Tiffany.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's kind of like a Tiffany.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, Tiffany. And?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The name of the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiffany's ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the name: Tiffany's Ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tiffany's Ship is the name of Tiffany's ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That makes it clear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How will they crack this if they hear us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all the code we need, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we reference the--?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We call it the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Apricot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Apricot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Apricot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything else before we get into this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is the Apricot this, or is the Apricot the tiny Tiffany Ship?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, it's this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's this, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your heart? The Apricot is your heart?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Say that again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the tip of the tiny Tiffany Ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so, how will we deal with Tiffany?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which one's Tiffany?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's walk-and-talk about Tiffany.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course we're walking-and-talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm keeping an eye open for every suspicious-looking asshole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiffany can be invisible though, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tiffany doesn't know that we're talking about her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She went to bed, she's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye out to see if the mist ever parts around us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both you and Beau make perception checks, please, since you're both keeping eyes out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She won't know we're talking about her because we're using a new name, Tiffany, so she's not even going to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're keeping a gauge on any of the wandering, patrolling guards to make sure as to not to speak too loudly or in the presence of anyone; conversation either shifting temporarily or coming to a lull and walking by in silence, but you manage to snake your way through a relatively quiet town beyond the various taverns this late at night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A lot of store fronts and things that are closed up for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do wander through what you assume to be the Sundry Square eventually, through this wandering. There is a makeshift pavilion where it's dotted with tables and crates under ratty awnings and canopies, but it's all closed and dark. There's no lights. It looks like none of the materials for sale are left behind. It's mainly just a structure and materials are probably brought there in the morning and are placed out for trade, sell, or whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you think it's weird that someone would be a pirate and they would come here because they were a pirate and then they change their mind and decide to be a shopkeeper here instead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Maybe they were looking for a new environment and they found exactly what they were looking for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe they thought they were tough and strong, and they were not as tough and strong as they thought, so now they sell rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It feels like a farmer's market. It feels like certain people sell things whenever they got them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, natural 17, for 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do know Darktow, before it was taken by pirates about 45 years or so beforehand, it was just another city of the Clovis Concord. It belonged to the Menagerie Coast, and it was one of the central port stops for a lot of the trade routes making their way to the coast. Then it was taken by the Revelry, and they reinforced it and made it defensible. They didn't slaughter everyone there, because they weren't there to kill everyone. They were there to take it over. They killed those who were, in their opinion, incorrectly placed in charge, any dissenters, and then anybody who agreed to join the Revelry, "Join or Die" type circumstance, everyone who had previously been at the island were absorbed into the Revelry. Some of them have continued their life there, some of them, their bloodline has continued to be those that maintain other forms of business. Not everyone is technically a pirate; there are a lot of members of the Revelry that are just civilians of Darktow and maintain the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was a lot of assimilation here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like Orlando.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Sure! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We love you, Orlando.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hear that? Taliesin has plans for you, Orlando.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Deep plans.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I may?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's our options.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have a powerpoint?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't, but I've been thinking about things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How drunk are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm lit. I'm tight, but feeling good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Amigo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our intent is to get off this island without Tiffany, correct?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Well, I think it's less about getting off this island without Tiffany and more about getting to that shipwreck first, before her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's the highest priority. The only thing that we haven't discerned from Tiffany is if she knows where the next--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Apricot?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we know where the apricot might be, where the next apricot tree might be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fruit stand? Apricot tree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or fruit stand. I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can get in touch with this Allison person, follow her--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, right? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, if you used her right name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could talk to some of Tiffany's crew, right? Bouldergut seems dumb.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You shouldn't use her real name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then, there's this Sorris fellow. I don't know, he didn't seem like he's be a font of any knowledge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can sabotage Tiffany's ship. I don't know what that would do because we need it to get off the island. We could frame Tiffany for some crime against another pirate! We have a signature from Tiffany in a letter that she wrote. We have-- that is all that we have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming a lot of her valuable information is locked away in her captain's quarters somewhere on Tiffany's ship. If we can get the information to the next apricot tree, then do we need Tiffany anymore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just remembered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I have this new spell that the Traveler was telling me about. It lets you pop in somewhere. You can just pop in and then you can bring somebody with you. It's like a doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could pop in where? To her ship? To her captain's quarters?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would pop into her office.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the ship? On the Tiffany ship?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away can you do a pop-in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really good question! Let me think about it. Hey, Traveler, how far away can I use this spell? 500 whole feet, he says!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a lot of feet. So many feet. Look, if I've learned anything about important people, it's that they can't resist putting shit down on paper. I guarantee you, there's something in her office.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how we would get out of it once I was in there though, because I can only use it once but I suppose--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can just leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but wouldn't somebody be keeping watch on the ship, though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's our ship, we work on the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have credentials? Do we have like, badges? Like beep-beep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I can tell you that her quarters have a balcony.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, can you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could also potentially send Frumpkin with a note or letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And do what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Leave it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean like plant something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I want to get something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rifle through her stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, because if we are planning to leave without her, that means she'll give chase-- I mean, I hate to even suggest it, but I'd rather not have someone hot on our tail.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, this leads me to a question I have which is, instead of discussing the short term which we want to do, I want to ask you about the long term. If we ditch Tiffany, and we find the apricot tree, what happens then? Like, what is your plan with this apricot? I think we have ideas about what could come from it. She's done what she did at the first tree and you got the next tree, and maybe she races to the-- What happens next, Fjord? Like, I know you are curious, but what is the plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we be using your name or should we call you something else right now too?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tusktooth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll call him Honda.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many nicknames.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm lost.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, as Honda, I would race to the apricot and seize it so that she can't pick that fruit. Keep it for ourselves in our fruit basket, and make off and decide if we're going to make marmalade later or not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like marmalade.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know how, at the first tree, an apricot was picked and things shook, something happened there. This place was all about drei, the number three, so you want to go pluck another fruit and that's two out of three and what happens once the third--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We actually don't know where the other tree is yet, that's the thing. We just know where the fruit is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Personally, I feel more comfortable with Honda controlling the supply of apricots than Tiffany.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're in season right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am not telling any of you, especially you, what to do here, but an alternative plan is to get rid of anyone who knows about the location of the tree and bury the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The tree we just came from or the tree that we're going to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we do that, we might need to ask Tiffany if she knows the location of the tree because it hasn't been brought up as of yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck asking Tiffany any questions. We break into Breakfast at Tiffany's and get the information that we need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a long walk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a long walk, but we're all on the same page. Okay, are we up for a little B&E?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eyy, this is my specialty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In real life or the game?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No comment. I plead the fifth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will we be using the fancy doorway?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think to get in, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, absolutely. Don't you have another way to make a door?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's in an emergency.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yes, but that is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be permanent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the thing, she would definitely see there was a new door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also, you said there was a balcony right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was there a door to the balcony? Do you think that would be locked?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean there was a door-- was it solid wood or did it have glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it had two glass doorways, like windows, but they open like doors and latch shut.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, if you could get in to her cabin, you can Disguise Self as well, right? You could change yourself to Vera or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or to Avantika.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or to Avantika or Vera?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean Tiffany?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit! Shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! We were doing so well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll initiative!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's here?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could turn yourself into Franklin Delano Roosevelt. You could walk off the ship and no one would think the wiser, or they might say, "Franklin Delano Roosevelt! Why are you on "Tiffany's ship?" You'd be like, "Bitch, I work here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are there two of you here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm Franklin Delano Roosevelt!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt and then you're two people on a ship and you're involved in things and-- I mean, it's a good emergency plan, but can you only go once? You can't go twice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't go twice. I can just do it once.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if some of us kept Avantika busy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tiffany.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is difficult.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A few of us were eating apricots at the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if Fjord keeps Tiff busy-

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Honda.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, oh man--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Honda keeps Tiffany busy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if the green guy and the gal are busy, you follow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need to have Honda distract Tiffany? Can we not do this right now while she's theoretically sleeping?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You walk off the boat, because Tiffany is busy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true, he could be accountable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 100% busy, not maybe busy, maybe she's sleeping, maybe she's out for a walk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For sure busy. We could have this guy with Frumpkin making sure that they're busy, if you're comfortable with that. You don't have a lot of a choice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you keep Tiffany busy for, you know, 15 or 20 minutes?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 25 if you really had to? Take a break?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe with a short rest. Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a good plan, and we're going to go in there-- oh, you're going to go in there. Do you need some help?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should bring somebody with me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my forte, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, me and you, Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except Beau can't make herself look like anything else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But if I'm with the queen, then what does it matter?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's the queen in this scenario?

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Tiffany.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fake Tiffany.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't want yourself connected with this at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, here's the thing. Caduceus is really perceptive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The two clerics are not going on the mission together!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can break into things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're very sneaky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're small.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can also talk to Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's also true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are you going to get off the boat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make myself look like something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true, you could be Sorris.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't Ipsis-- small like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ipess? Ipess is a gnome, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could be Ipess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ipess! That's right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can give you guys enhanced ability, too, for the remains of the evening. You can pick something and both of you, if you want to be better at something for a little while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We never get into trouble together. I mean, this is foolproof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It cannot fail!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any time we've tried to do anything together, it went off seamlessly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the best plan we've ever had.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are me and Cad doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need someone just off the boat in case things go awry. I'll message you that we need some help on the inside, and there needs to be someone on the outside of Honda and Tiffany in case he needs some help in there, I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cad, can you go with Honda?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wouldn't know how to help with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have to be nearby.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also seems like a lot of commitment, but okay. I can keep an eye on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also where are we staying tonight? Are we staying at The Bloated Cup, or we finding--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could stay on the boat. That would solve all of our problems.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On Tiffany's ship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we've been staying on it already, don't we have quarters on there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean there are quarters on there you can stay in, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where were we meant to stay? Where are the other crew staying? On the ship or on land?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure. Some of them you saw found rooms up top, above the tavern you were in. Others left for the night, you don't know where they went.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just so we're not suspicious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have we seen anything around like another tavern or something maybe a little, I hate to say, more upscale, but cleaner?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really, not here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something with less piles of shit behind it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You passed a number of homes of people that live here or spend a lot of time here and have in a boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you feel about rooms at the Bloated, Cad?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three rooms?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Three rooms.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hopefully some with windows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Smells like shit in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all wait until Fjord starts boning, and then we start our action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about this: Caleb and Caduceus and Fjord, you're one team. You have Frumpkin watch Fjord, you give me the word when it's good to go, I'll deliver that to Nott and Jessie, they go--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is way more complicated than I thought it was going to be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, actually I'm following it actually for the first time this entire--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll give you the signal, you guys go, I'll be nearby, I'll distract any guards if need be with my feminine wiles, and then you let me know if there's any emergency--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the runner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then I will have no means to communicate with anybody else, but you will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll be a good go between. If we hear something bad, we can get an owl to ship, if you hear something, then--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, that's a good point. How far away is the Bloated Cup from the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the boat? The Bloated Cup is right off from where all the docks join and from the shipyard, so it's maybe about 300 feet away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's amazing. Cool. Perfect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Famous last words.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good. It might be our downfall, but it's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so I'll try and be within eyeshot of the Bloated Cup, within eyeshot of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Honda, are you going to be able to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I'll be fine. I'll make sure she's occupied.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying, there's gonna be a peeping tom in the room with you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, what do you mean "in the room"?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we need Frumpkin in there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What form is Frumpkin, an octopus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A peeping tomcat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's been in my---

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see this really uncomfortably frazzled owl that's been jammed in a pocket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry I don't--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I carrying him in, like it's no big?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I don't think we--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he can fly outside the window and peek in, just to see if you're--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Avantika knows, I mean Tiffany knows that that owl is yours, Caleb, it's not like it's a secret, if she's seen the owl before she's going to know you're spying on her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't need to actually know what's going on in there. Why does anybody need to know that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think so. Listen, let's just kick this thing off. I'll toss Frumpkin back to Caleb. Look, I leave this in your capable hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, Frumpkin has had a peek inside of her quarters after she has seen him. She did not see him the first time. Although, to be doubly sure I could change his shape again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I think the thing to do here, I mean, it just makes sense, is that if you leave the room for any reason, we send Frumpkin to the ship. They see Frumpkin, they know it's time to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To get out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the signal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If for some reason Tiffany's on the move, or if something seems up, listen for thunder. How about that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here, I slip Caduceus a few of those firecrackers that I have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His boning makes thunder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the source of the thunder? Is that like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His weenie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing I could say would beat that. So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But, you know, if we're not comfortable, I could change Frumpkin to be, say, a raven or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, whatever you feel is best.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long will that take?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, here we go. I head off towards The Bloated Cup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We head towards the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Break!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We walk towards the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a little bit to see how this--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is either the best plan or the worst plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: EmperorGeiserick, congratulations. We'll get your info and get this sent out to you ASAP. Well done, hope you enjoy. Bringing us into the moment as you guys scatter to your various plans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a great plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have Fjord going to the upper floor of the Bloated Cup. What are the rest of you doing at this moment?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real confident, real strong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm staying downstairs to wait for you to either come down or for her to leave. I'm going to sit and probably try and find something non-alcoholic to drink so I don't have to be an idiot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's where it's going to go down is in the Bloated Cup.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Upstairs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought maybe it would say like maybe you know, romantic on the boat. But great. Good. So, if that's the case, then I'm not getting into that room. I think that I should tail this team instead, if you've got an eye on the exit to that building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me see, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shouldn't you be able to Message Nott and say she's on the move if--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe stay close where you can see it if she leaves?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yasha is doing what as part of this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think Yasha is probably either with you-- She's either with you or with us, I imagine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If things go really bad, she'll be ready to help out on that side of things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If Bouldergut is in the Bloated Cup, that's where Yasha is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn my cloak inside-out to the inconspicuous side, and case towards the docks, and start casing the area for Revelry that are guarding the area, or potentially, a good place for them to do the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is somebody aiding you in that? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Okay. Looking out along the docks, there are two particular watch-outs that are assigned to that particular part of the docks, where the Squalleater is currently wet anchored. You also see two individuals on the deck of the ship, not holding torches, but you can see them through the fog. One of them walks and moves. That's what you see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see anything that looks like it could be a potentially good area for them to cast a spell without being noticed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The docks are pretty open here. There isn't much of a place to hide. This isn't a major shipping region. Most everything is taken off the docks and off the ships and then brought into shore, so there isn't a bunch of errant piles of boxes and barrels, per se. The docks are pretty open. Best bet would be somehow under the docks, but most of that is in the ocean, or trying your best to wait for a moment when people aren't paying attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I block around as to not look like it's going the same way that I just came from and catch back up with these two. With the detectives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys are having this conversation, Beauregard manages to circle back and come back to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, there's two guards casing the dock and two of Avantika's-- Tiffany's people on the ship. It looks pretty open, we might want to find an alternative for you guys to not be noticed as you do the crazy magic thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It looks open?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's super open, two guards guarding the dock and two people on the deck of Tiffany's ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Getting on is not a problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can just go to our quarters or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To then bamf over? Our quarters in the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inside the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. What do you think?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can just be there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are going to have to talk to guards and convince yourself on the way in and you will be noticed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. We just are in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because it's our ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're talking about two different things here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please, start over again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are two guards guarding the docks, there are two people on the ship of Avantika's bo-- of Tiffany's boat. On the de-- You get what I'm saying? The deck of the ship. Of the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's real sotto, so we don't have to use code words anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you all want to just walk on to your quarters, you will have two guards and two of our crew members who will see you walk on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think what Beau's implying is perhaps it's better that we're never seen there at all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We hide somewhere and we're never seen at all and you'll bamf in. Unless you disguise yourself as Tiffany now. Then I would say we find a hidden place, potentially in our private quarters in the Bloated Cup, that you bamf into.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it within 500 feet of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He said it was within 300.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yeah. Yeah, let's go to our quarters in the Bloated Cup.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to start the bamf there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Start it in the tavern!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will be nearby, near the docks. Signal if you need me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You won't see us ever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First, I'm going to disguise myself when it is time. Not yet, but I will make myself look like voice actor Charlie Adler. I will be salt-and-pepper-- I'll fit right in on the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you'll fit right in in Darktow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I won't be in a denim tuxedo, but I will wear traditional pirate garb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's our type, man, he thinks sleeves are bullshit too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are bullshit. There will be no sleeves on this disguise. I'm going to hang out between the Bloated Cup and the ship, looking like Charlie. Frumpkin I will just have circle a continuous circle above the whole area so I can see the guards on the boat, and we can message each other, ja? I'll just be eyes in the sky, Charlie on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's a dex bonus go for you? How's an advantage on dex, or do you already have--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I have very high dexterity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could always use advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Less that could possibly go wrong, so before they go in, I'm going to cast Enhance Ability on these two. At a level three, so I get two people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe charisma?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, for the deception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leaving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can already dex my way around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could potentially jump out the window too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you can't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you dextrous?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so dextrous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also will give you zero damage for a 20-foot fall, if I give you a dex bonus. But--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have Feather Fall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have Feather Fall. So you want charisma.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not helpful. Charisma. Unless you make a decision in the next 30 seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I want it! Give it to me now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. And you're getting wisdom. You have advantage on wisdom, you have advantage on charisma. Then right before you go in, I'm going to give you guys both a resistance bump before we push them through the door. Just in case you need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're up in our rooms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For one minute, they can add a d4 to a saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, did anyone touch the dodecahedron yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fjord, do you want to do it? I guess you're already fucking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'm not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want the dodeca?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it just a general d4 bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you using?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A cantrip. You touch one willing creature once before the spell ends. The target can roll a d4 and add the number to its roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Resistance. It is a concentration, so that would override your Enhance Ability.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you're right, absolutely, never mind then. Not a big deal. Thank you. I'm getting used to this concentration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all good, no worries. It's a little bit of a juggle. All right, while this is all being set up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, just look at the dodecahedron.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fate point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before they leave and we all go our respective ways, I go: All right, listen. Rich people love to have safes, but they love to hide stuff in the walls of safes, like false bottoms in drawers. Stuff like that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: False backs to safes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: False backs to safes. So even if you get in, and you think you find everything, double- and triple-check, all right? They love to write shit down, I'm telling you it's there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've stolen from a lot of rich people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. She stole mail one time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, it's sort of her defining trait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That and her beautiful hair. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was she not complimenting me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, she was laughing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wasn't, Beau, I love your hair. I wasn't laughing at you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just go steal from rich people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wasn't laughing at you, I love your hair, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're ready. Let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys begin to set your ways, Fjord. You make your way to the Bloated Cup. Where do you head?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Thunderstruck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll head up the stairs to the second room on the right, was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Left. Second room on the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to knock?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone in the hallways?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No sign of Bouldergut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no sign of Bouldergut.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's an ogre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, second door on the right, and I'll put my ear against the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make another perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, balls, ass. Oh, three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't hear anything through the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't hear from the blood pumping in his ears?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (heartbeat) (knocking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a slight pause and you hear some rustling and some shuffling. A voice goes, "Who is it?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Is-- (clears throat) is the captain in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who the fuck is this?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord. Who's this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Piss off, I'm sleeping."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second door on the-- Is there a door across the hall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll put my ear on that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't hear anything. (faster heartbeat)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it look like there's any light on under the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear some heavy shifting. "Hi?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bouldergut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Avantika's sitting on the edge of the bed, currently reading through a book with the window open outside, and goes, "Quartermaster."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bouldergut, if you would be so kind as to keep watch on the hallway for a bit." Bouldergut goes, "Okay. If I hear any--" "If you hear anything, don't bother." "Okay." She leaves the chamber, closes the door behind her. Closes the book, sets it on a small table.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's very loyal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is my favorite kind of person."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long has Bouldergut been with you in your service?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Going on the better part of a decade. We actually both met when I was first beginning my career."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quite some time. How have your evenings been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, very busy with our attempt to make it to Darktow and keep things organized in "preparation. So. Lonely."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any more dreams?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A few."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tell me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How about I show you instead?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. I'd like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you begin keeping her busy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or she keeps you busy, actually, would be more the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, that's more correct, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While that's happening, you guys made your way back to the inn. It's a very muddied view of the ship because of the mist, but you can still make out the major details of the outskirts of it from this far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I don't need to be able to see it. I know exactly the spot I desire. I can visualize it because we've been in her office before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You have. So yeah, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How does this work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I've never done it before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, is there a chance it could fail? Might we die?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Never.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do me a favor. I'm going to go outside now, okay, and keep watch. Let me know when you're on and give me updates. Good luck. Charlie Adler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The best new abracadabra.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charlie! For every spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm on my way towards the docks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we synchronizing watches? What is this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doorways are the tits!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief moment where you feel like the air's been drawn out of your lungs, and you feel as if you're being suddenly thrust forward from behind, somebody pushing the small of your back with such intense speed that you feel like your neck is about to just whiplash terribly backward. Then suddenly you come to a stop, and you're both standing in the middle of Avantika's quarters on the ship. It's dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on both of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yas, queen, yas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was amazing! We are secret agents! We're secret detectives!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are amazing! We need to start looking because we only have a few minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Oh, wait, I've already forgotten! Take out the wire, fold it just so. Okay. We're in the ship, Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 120 feet. Can you hear me? Reply to this message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The range on Message?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 120 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 120 feet? He's out of range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm out in the docks. You said the boat--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You haven't made it there yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're staying in between. I'm heading a little bit further. The daisy chain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you guys instantaneously traveled. He has a few more minutes before he'll reach range.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you guys, to Beau, to Caleb, to Cad, to Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beauregard, can you hear me? If you can, respond to this message.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can hear you. I have responded to this message.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are inside the boat. Relay that message when you can. Bye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, start looking. Can we both see, because we both have darkvision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, but there's a lack of color. It's mostly some shades of black and white and gray.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably figure out a way to light up the room. Are there curtains?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two sets of small curtains that are currently tied off on the sides of the windows that can open onto the balcony.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to burn them for light?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we should close them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. That's better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sneak over and close the windows quietly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just close the windows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a general note, I would like you both to make a stealth check as you go about your activities.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hood up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, while they do that-- I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you already have advantage? Blessing of the Trickster! There you go, I gave you blessing, so you get advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you give yourself advantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Natural 20!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten, because Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, and what's your total?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24? No, wait. 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck. Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both are (whooshing). For every piece of wood that begins to creak as you step, because it is a lot of aged wood that makes up this ship, begins to (creak), you stop yourself, and then shift the foot and you manage to make your way across here without any of the wood creaking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does she have a candle in the room that we could light?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of candles, you could see that there's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's probably gap under the doorway, a gap under there. They'll see a glowing light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take your cloak off and shove it under the door to block the light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would reveal my unmentionables!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take my cloak off and I put it next to the doorway to block the light.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take my cloak and hang it over the curtains so it's double-blocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, like duvet over the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I light the candle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I signal to Caleb that they've made it on the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was going to say, once I'm out and about, about once every 30 seconds I will lean on something, pretending like I'm slightly drunk, and I will go into Frumpkin's vision from above, just for five seconds, to look at the activity on the boat and where those guards are, and then go out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check for Frumpkin. I'll say at disadvantage because of the mist, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ooh, terrible. So terrible. That's six or seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can see the torchlight from the two guards that are on the actual docks, and one of them's keeping an eye out on the water, and one of them's keeping an eye on the docks. They're stationed to keep an eye out not just to what's happening within the actual shipyard, but also beyond, as far as they can into the mist, for any ships that are arriving in the middle of the night. But Frumpkin cannot see the people on the actual deck of the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all that fog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does Nott's cloak unattune if they take it off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yes. Now that you have the candlelight there, gently there, quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We start searching through her office.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you looking for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're looking for anything she's written about where the last fruit tree is, the last temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going through papers, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going through papers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go around the walls and look for hidden safes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking through her desk, seeing if I can find any false bottoms or anything like that to try to find secret information.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you want to each make an investigation check, or do you want to help one or the other make it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Each make an investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then both of you make an investigation check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we get advantage? No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you do not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We get advantage on everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You took charisma and wisdom, so you do not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine. Which is like a natural 20 in this campaign.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Going through the desk, the first thing that happens is one of the drawers gives you resistance. It's locked. The other drawers you pull open, there is blank paper, a quill, a couple of small little ink pots. The next one beneath has a folded piece of cloth that you pull out and inspect. It looks like it's a cover either for the desk or something else. You're not quite sure what the purpose is. Checking under the desk, you don't find any other hidden chambers or anything that marks what you were searching for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you were looking for--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hidden safes in the wall, trap-opening thingies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around, there is a shelf unit with a number of books on it. You pull back some of the books and look behind it, along the back of the actual bookshelf itself. You don't find any hidden pockets in there. There's a small cabinet underneath, and you open it up and there's a series of wooden and metal cups, wine goblets and various types of imbibement containers. Pushing through there, you do find one panel on the back that's a bit loose, and you slide it off and behind there you see a small leather book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll check it for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and consider this a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What would investigation have been?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're a badass rogue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It depends. There's a difference between noticing something's off, and then ascertaining the nature of whatever's off that would be an actual trap. Since you're looking for traps, specifically for this one, and not noticing something different, I would say allowing this to be an investigation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's still pretty low. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is better than three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. It does not appear to be trapped.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I will pick up the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pull the book back, and as soon as you pull back there's a slight tug on it, like something that gives resistance, and then comes free. A little piece of cable or twine falls to dangle from behind one side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been made! Turn over the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (hissing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. Hit the deck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This room begins to fill with a very faint fume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold your breath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We hold our breath! I take out the paint and I paint a hole in the bottom of the floor. In!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not yet, no! Hold your breath, we've got to look around! I'm still looking, I'm holding my breath and I'm looking. You paint, I'm looking. I look at the book, is there anything there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking inside the book, there's a bunch of scrawlings. What languages do you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Common, Goblin, Halfling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not recognize any of the languages in the book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taking the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You put the book inside your pocket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go over to the desk where Jester had pointed and start jimmying the lock on the locked thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a lockpicking check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? It's not opening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pull it open. (grunt) And just: smoke!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to pull it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loudly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull the drawer open, look inside. It looks like there are a few small jewelry boxes that are resting inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taking them all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was just looking, but you can take, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The drawer, do you put it back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you shove it back in. The edges are splintered. It is very apparently physically damaged. You also hear footsteps descending from the outside of the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to look more!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (negative noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, get in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a rug in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a rug, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I pull the rug over the hole that I just made after we go under.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to grab a cloak off the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I do the same thing, I see her do it and I grab my thing and blow out the candle, and go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. First off--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't need this in my life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now there's a permanent hole there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your constitution modifiers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Modifiers? Two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. With the little bit of conversation that's there, that's reduced the time, you're just now hitting the time where your breath is starting to hurt, so you both, holding it, dive down and then, what, you--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I go down the hole, I pull the rug over the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have no idea where this takes us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, by the way, you're down now on the lower deck, this is the deck where most of the crewmen quarters are, and you're down in one of the bedrooms. You glance over to the side and there's a person sleeping in the bed right there, the blanket coiled over. They're like, (snoring).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to very quietly say: Wait until you hear a body fall above us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) Take one of the things you stole and put it next to them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Okay. (normal volume) What did I steal?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jewelry boxes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bunch of jewelry boxes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I open one up and see what's in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You look inside and there's a bunch of jewelry, jewels; it's an actual small jewel collection.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Put the jewel right on his shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the person who's sleeping?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I tuck it under the blanket, like it was with him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just like Macbeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the one jewel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to keep the rest for myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. You hear the door above open. (creak, footsteps). "Hey. Anyone?" The person who's sleeping is like (snorts, grunts).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to crawl under his bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both of you guys make a stealth check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You still have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! That's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23 plus ten, still?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18. Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 33, I guess. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't notice the gem. He's like, "Fuck." " I'm so sorry, mate! I didn't mean--" "Shit, what the "fuck happened?" "I don't know. It's a fucking faulty floor or something!" "Fuck." "Well, let's "get you to a surgeon or something." He stands up and rolls off and the blanket falls over next to you guys. (clanking) The gem does fall. Neither of them notice it. You watch as they shuffle out of the room, and the door closes behind them, and you guys are now in the chamber with the open hole of Avantika's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go back up, we can keep looking! Lift me up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if the poison is still up there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's probably wafted out by now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also hear the coughing of the man who was stabbed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Down the hall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peek my head up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's inhaled whatever had been released in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will lift Nott up, to peek her head through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you peek up and look. The door that looks inside of the chamber-- Okay, first off make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're bad at everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you are considered confused.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Confused is complicated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's going to tell you; you've got to roll to see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll tell you here in a second what's going on now. You get the sense at this moment that the other gentleman, while coughing, managed to resist the effect of the fume in the chamber. You did not. You do notice the doorway is still open, because he just came inside to look, and across the way you see them both coming up the stairs, because they're making their way up from the crew quarters, to the area near Avantika's chamber, which is right by the deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tap her head: Down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Okay, I bring--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, while that's happening, I'm going to go ahead and roll a d10.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can act normally. So you can do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, you're lucky!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to say: Down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I crouch down so Nott can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They walk up past. Make a saving throw again. A wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Constitution to see that the toxin took hold, and now it's wisdom to resist the effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's another failure. You're both sitting there quietly as they are walking across in front.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Nott-- suddenly her eyes go wide and she begins to drool a bit, and the body locks up. You're unable to speak, unable to move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) What? What's going on? Nott! Shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear now a little bit of raised voices and you can now hear this on the dock. One of them's going, "What's going on?" The other one's like, "I have to get this guy to a doctor, he got "stabbed." The other voice goes, "By fucking you, you twat!" He's like, "I'm sorry!" "Oh, fine." They start leading him off the ship. One of the guards begins to lead them off the docks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast Lesser Restoration on Nott? Nott. Snap out of it. Nott!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does Lesser Restoration--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. I didn't even look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know if it does anything for this spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Condition-- no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a condition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One condition affecting and the condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. That does not affect it, so I need you to make another wisdom saving throw, Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb probably has wandered close enough to the boat now, and hearing--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm daisy chaining to it, I give you a signal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to resist the confusion effect. Aw, I was so hoping you were going to attack her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she could be straight up like, "Nope!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would've been fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I don't know what just happened. This is a crazy ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I heard them yelling. How do we get off of here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we do? We left a hole in the floor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's call for help. Caleb, can you hear me? We're in big trouble.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, me! We already went through this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need help! We need a distraction. Is Caleb there yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've established the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The daisy chain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb does not answer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Going to try it again. Beauregard, we're going to need a distraction to get out of here!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott, tell her nothing crazy, you know. You don't want it to connect to us or anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mild confusion and panic, but don't-- what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe we can just get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to disguise ourselves?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, right. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold on, I'll call you back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to disguise ourselves as?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were going to be Avantika and I was going to be Ipess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we still going to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't make any sense right now, does it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it doesn't make any more sense, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wander like a drunkard past Caleb and I go: Oh, so distracting. Like I need distractions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I make another hole in the floor and we keep going down until we can get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess she will have seen one hole by now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Apologies to my German teacher from high school. I start pissing on the docks and singing: Laurentia, liebe Laurentia mein.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there any portal windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the room you're in right now? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Am Sonntag. (speaking) Urination. (singing) Ach wenn es doch endlich schon--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to grab that jewel that was on the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make a performance check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, I'm definitely pissing and singing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep. I have rolled such shit tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So sorry buddy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a five. (singing) Von Dienstag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For all that you've been drinking over the past 24 hours, the tension has caused your bladder to retain everything and you're barely eking out a sputtering stream.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Well, I'll do my best to knock things over as I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There isn't anything to knock over, these are open docks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Hey, Macarena!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I stand up on the bed and try to make the hole look like it wasn't perfectly painted, like it was like broken wood?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait! Just paint wood there!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do that, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't paint on nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if I can use one of my pieces of paper to like put on there and then make it wood, like, fix it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you do that and as soon as you do that the paper falls as a plank of wood.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I thought was going to happen, but I wanted to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you awhile to do that. It's a few minutes to paint the wood properly to have the effect kick in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can mark off another two square feet. In the time they're doing that, what are you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he is being a creepo, I go over to the two guards on the dock. This drunk piece of shit over here, he tried to attack me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them has already pushed past you with a wounded man. The three of them making their way while he escorts them off of the docks, so there's only one man left on the dock by the ship. He passes by you as well. They don't seem interested in this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) We will, we will, rock you. Rock you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, guy who was left, that guy is an asshole, and what's with that guy that just got stabbed? I feel very unsafe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You feel unsafe in Darktow?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm just saying--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome to Darktow."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He tried to, I think, rob me? I thought, as a pirate, that I had immunity to that? I don't know, I'm just trying--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He shifts in close and he looks at you real closely and goes, "Actually, I don't think I've "seen you around here before."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, technically, I'm new. Great to meet you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) B-A-N-A-N-A-S!

lines.name: MATT
