lines.text: "We're going to go ahead and have a conversation off the docks. Please follow me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure! Let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pats you on the shoulder and starts leading you off the dock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're fucking welcome. Go, go, go, go, go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's her painting going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still doing your distraction. Travis, you're doing good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good show.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll open the door. Is there any ice? No? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass. When you finish painting, the wood falls. While that's happening, that moment is occurring, you and Yasha, in the tavern, are keeping an eye. You watch as one of the crewmates comes walking in rather rapidly and goes and talks to somebody in the corner that you recognize from Avantika's crew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm going to join in really quickly. Is everything all right? You guys need anything? I've been sober all evening so I'm happy to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I heard Waldok got stabbed for some reason."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who got stabbed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Waldok!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Waldok got stabbed? But Waldok's so nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who would stab Waldock? That's terrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Exactly! I'm curious!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did you hear this from? Where did this come down from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I saw him! He got stabbed! Right out there!" and he points out the door and you can see him motioning towards the bar.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, he seems okay, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You seem him bleeding out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come here, we're going to patch you right up. C'mon. I'll take care of this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody come on, let's do this. Yeah, how bad is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, he's not dead, but for his level of life experience, he's taken a significant amount of damage and if left it will probably eventually get infected.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to give him a level two Cure Wounds to get him going. That'd ought to heal him, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it and roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, let's do a level two. Let's see what that looks like. That's 2d8. Don't know why I'm being so fuddy-duddy about this. Do I get a specialty-- no, it's only when I'm healing myself. Okay, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's enough to bring him back. You concentrate on him, he winces and you watch as the wounds close up. There's no mark, no scarring. He looks at the wound and goes, "Mr. Clay, thank you "very much."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we get this man a drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that. You're too kind, really." Zoen goes "See? No hard feelings, right?" and Waldock decks him across the chin. Zoen falls to the ground grabbing the side of his face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't you get that man a drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While that's happening, and that's happening, and that's happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Hast du etwas Zeit fur mich?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to do what I originally planned which is to make the hole not look like a perfect hole. To make it look like the planks broke or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, no, should I do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're going to find a hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leave the fucking hole the way it is! We'll leave a couple gems in the bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two gems.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two gems in the bed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One gem. I'll break it in two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you a few minutes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to take your dagger and score it a bit and then try and press it again. Better part of three or four minutes to try to find the right edge to bend and break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does eventually break unevenly into three or four small, crumbled pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leave that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Someone was eating gems in bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's even harder to spot them now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Perfect. Now we disguise ourselves, yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to cast Disguise Self on each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only on oneself, but yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll wrap our arms around each other and then disguise ourselves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Taking the form of Avantika and Ipess, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to be Keg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. I'm going to be Molly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's loud. Okay. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In pirate clothes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pirate Keg, Pirate Molly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The most inconspicuous person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With a cloak over his head!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a purple tiefling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are disguised--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did it. I already said it. Still Pass Without A Trace. Still trying to sneak out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up on deck though, and see if anyone's around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check-- sorry, a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Perception or-- what are we?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mist makes it hard to make out much detail. You do notice, glancing up, there is an individual in the crow's nest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (loading bow)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say about 40 to 45 feet as an estimation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to cast Phantasmal Force on that person, on that being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've never seen your eyes glaze over like that Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's your DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intelligence, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DC 14. No, did not succeed with a natural eight, plus two, ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Describe the crow's nest to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the main mast of the ship that goes up, the crow's nest is in itself a circular platform at the top that is used primarily for keeping a watch on nearby land and details in the sea around, as well as direction. It's a vantage point for someone to keep an eye on the area around the ship. There is somebody stationed up there to keep an eye on the ship overnight. Or at least there for as long as their portion of it was. You can't make out the details of the figure from this distance. You just see a figure there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will make the figure think that his crow's nest has caught fire, and there are little flames licking around, creeping up the sides of it, and surrounding it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you finish the spell, a moment goes by and you hear (panicked shouting) "Fuck! Shit!" You look up and you see this individual trying to bat their cloak on the sides of this before shouting "Help!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run! We run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While stealthing? Or just running?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Off the back of the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. They have major disadvantage to try and spot you because they're distracted by the flames.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we being stealthy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're stealthing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were stealthing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or running?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're stealthing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're moving from--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're stealthing.

lines.name: SAM, LAURA
lines.text: We're stealthing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make stealth checks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys both manage to scoot over to the edge of the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The seaward side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The seaward side. All right, You're heading off--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The seaward side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'd be the starboard side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. The side away from the docks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. You head over to that which is the starboard side of the ship. There's the ocean below you. A person screaming up top and getting more and more frantic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jump in!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put that book in the bag so it doesn't get wet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did I get arrested?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: None of us knew about the crow's nest person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We jump in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, unfortunately perception wasn't high enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (drunken singing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're jumping in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both leap off the side into the freezing cold ocean water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's try to go in quietly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still going to make a splash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Baby seal style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you hear (screaming).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Swim away. I'll hold your hand as I walk away on the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm in a great deal of pain!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, whoever it was, they landed. They're alive, but they're not doing that well. They broke something on the way down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's that charisma bonus working out for you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm lying great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is going perfectly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You shot me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now the screaming is less frantic and more a pained scream while the rest of the various watchers of the dock start making their way over, while you guys are swimming?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm wet and upset! Why did you do that?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just away and around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're probably following under the docks. All right. Both of you guys make an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's walking. She's swimming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, you're walking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, that was almost a one. But it's not. It's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you didn't have to make it because you're walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19! All right. The water, as it's coming in, the waves are crashing against the rocky edge and shore of Darktow Isle right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't let go, Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't ever let go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One end of the docks, you can hear the footsteps passing overhead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god! I'm letting go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you both to make a stealth check to try to make your way back onto land without being sighted by any of the nearby guard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (relieved groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You both are-- oh, you're soaking wet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Disguise Self, to where we look dry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm probably a bit wet too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, yeah, because you dove into the water before jumping in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm wet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Otherwise you'd have taken the impact damage from that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (impact)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Unless you'd have taken that dex bonus, and then nothing would have happened at all!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all good. You both climb up on there, dripping a bit wet, you especially soaking. A lot of the guards and the torches are making their way there, other ones are still starting to make sure they aren't losing track of their post. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, just calmly walking away, right? Are there lots more people coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're coming toward the screaming and yelling. There are still others there that are patrolling and keeping an eye. They don't all of a sudden go: Someone's yelling! Everyone lose their post!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think I seem noticeable?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you look great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're both wet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we're Disguise Self, so we look dry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You look great. Do I look okay? Light my cigarette.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I feel like you may be less noticeable than a purple me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got a cloak on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pandemonium on the docks, right? At this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's borderline, but it's starting to calm a bit. Some of them have gotten up there, and they found the hurt guy. The spell lasts for how long?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disguise Self? Or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. The Phantasmal Force?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something is definitely not right, and the docks are now going into heightened search mode.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's get the fuck out of here, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're just going to calmly walk into town? I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. While you guys are doing that, Caleb, you see all this happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I would have quieted down with the singing and just tried to go more lowkey. I don't know what's going on, so I'm still watching the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And one eye on the Loaded Underwear-- What's it called? The Bloated--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bloated Cup?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bloated Cup. Fjord's Bloated Cup. What did you say? Perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still rolling shit tonight. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12, okay. You're just watching this whole thing unfold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boat. Bloated Cup. Back and forth. Waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure has their hand on your shoulder and calls over somebody else. He goes, "Hey, Waynon! Looks like we got someone who's stowed away here "to Darktow."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say: Sup, Waynen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks over to you and goes, "What's your business?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty sure she's above your pay grade, am I right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great fucking intimidation. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine? He doesn't appear to be shaken by it, but at least he finds a bit of truth to what you're saying. He's like, "Let her go."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't go wandering these docks at night by yourself for no fucking reason."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. Are you afraid I'm going to stub a toe in the middle of the night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just turns around and walks away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quit while you're ahead, motherfucker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau never does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, Beau, you turn around and you see Molly and Keg walking your way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just go: Oh fuck. I just keep walking like I don't know who they are and I pass by them with a glance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good evening, madam.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No smoke coming out of the cigarette.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dripping wet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You all eventually reconvene. You eventually complete your time with the captain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (door slamming) (heavy breathing) I look down the stairs. Can I see Caduceus down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you passed by Bouldergut and you looked down, yeah. Caduceus is down there. He's actually in a healthy conversation with one of the members of the group.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These guys are pretty okay once you get to know them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll come down and-- A drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A round is brought to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weird night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Deucey. How we doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, everything's not quiet on this end. One of our kids apparently got stabbed by-- Well, one of the crew stabbed the other crew. I can't imagine why that happened. There's been no word, but I assume it's just probably pandemonium all over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, good report.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone's pretty happy, though. You should come down and have a drink with everybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll just hold my cup and wait for something to happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody in the shit alley?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably drop our forms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And dry off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. In the shit alley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. In the shit alley, as it has now been deemed, you drop your various disguises.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we still soaking wet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you're damp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any spells that can make us dry?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope someone has followed this right back to the inn, so that's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, your weasel's dead again, isn't it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Nott, I have Mending.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that? What does that do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a cantrip and I can mend things that have holes in them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not a giant hole.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not a hole that big. It wouldn't have worked on a hole that big.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you saying to me that we made a mistake?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything we did was perfect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I agree!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it went according to plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got a book!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh, hide that. That's in my bag, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got some jewels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! We need to hide those too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are hot ice! We got to get rid of these.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck are we going to do? If she searches our shit, she's going to know that we stole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. Don't worry. We're going to plant them on Allison. Everything's going to be fine, don't worry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to figure this out, like stat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're clean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you did good in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You did too, you're pretty cool!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're pretty great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We're going to go into our rooms.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Charlie Adler busts into the inn and sees Caduceus and just stops the door and pulls out a little wire and says: I don't know where anybody is. We have to go to the boat now! Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you talking to?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not to the boat! Never to the boat!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one told Caleb shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You saw a lot of shit go down at the boat!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I saw people running to the boat in danger and you lead off. Pandemonium on the ship and fire on the ship!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll tell you what. Obviously whatever went down-- we're going to just go make sure everything's copacetic back at the boat. We'll be back in just a couple minutes. Just going to make sure everything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Good luck."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. We'll let you know. I'll walk brazenly down to the ship with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you step out of the inn, you watch Nott and Jester walking towards it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They dropped their shit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (protestant noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll go check it out anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't worry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going down there? Don't go down there, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there's guards everywhere!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you probably approached right before they did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sup, guys. How was your night walk?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It went very well, I take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, you're sitting over and you watch them all talking just outside of the inn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There was a little hiccup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Schmidle of a one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we took care of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shh. Who's around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are guards walking--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I see a commotion from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The commotion seems to have died down at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing crazy going on on our ship? I don't see some figures or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say with disadvantage from this distance.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love this. This is the best character ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing over, you don't see any torch-bearing guards, but you do see a figure that is doing a visual pass on the deck of the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might see if there's a torch-bearer walking around really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see one that's maybe 25, 30 feet from you that's just walking through the street.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excuse me, sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turns around. "Hey."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We had a little trouble on our ship earlier. I was curious if everything was all right. I heard a little commotion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. It's not my jurisdiction tonight."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if I wanted to find out what went down do you know who I would talk to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Probably one of the guys closer to the ship."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be right back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go find a guard and ask them what's up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, just throwing it out there, there seemed to be a couple of loose ends that we need to tie up. Can you make us an alibi?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like, suggest to someone that we were drinking with them all night, in case it's asked?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well then don't do that. Never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's really drunk, though? Is there someone real drunk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume a lot of people down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is anyone real drunk? Look real drunk in the tavern?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. Or actually, this would be an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was part of our crew. Part of the Squalleater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus. That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only see one figure you recognize from the crew.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry. It's a four. Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You only see one figure that you recognize from the crew and they are recovering from a series of stab wounds and are deep in their cups.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. What's-his-name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waldok.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I sit down next to Waldok with another drink and hand him a drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes it and goes, "Thanks!" (hiccup)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit, man. I am so sorry we couldn't have been there to protect you from these attackers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Attackers? It's just fucking him." He points over at the other guy who's just like, "Stop rubbing it in. I'm sorry! You fucking jumped into the middle of my room at night while I was "sleeping. What else am I supposed to do?" He's like, "Not stab me, asshole!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's the other guy's name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's Zoen."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry we couldn't have been there to protect you from Zoen. What a dick. I mean, we were here all night fucking trashed, so-- If we had only been there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The slow creep on your face, Matt! Come on, high!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15? Could've been better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you talk to them, about how you're sad you couldn't have been there. You can see Waldok's like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were drunk. Here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waldok's not really caring as much, more just like, "No, it's fucking his fault!" and Zoen's like, "Oversharing?" Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just want to find out what was up from somebody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the guards is keeping an eye over there with the torch. He's like, "Yeah, it looks "like there's a break-in of some sort; a guy was stabbed, got him safe. Another man broke his "fucking leg and he's being taken care of."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really? Does he need healing? I can do that, or otherwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure, I guess. This way."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take care of it real quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He brings you over to the dock and you look over and there's this guy, you know his name is Bart, he's one of the deckhands, and he's over on the side right now just going (pained groaning) and you can see, it's snapped. Like, bone protruded and everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, compound!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh in that case, Healing Word, level three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you may have to set the bone first.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make a medicine check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't accidentally turn it to fungus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that'll do, that's a 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love this character so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk up to him and he's like, "No no no no!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (pained gasp) (relieved gasp)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasp) He looks down and you can see there's a wave of relief on him as he doesn't have this like protruding fracture. It's set. Still, you can see the bone, but it's much better-looking than it was.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's give him a Cure Wounds level three just to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or, what does he look like, a level two or a level three to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that medicine check? A level two should be sufficient.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A level two should be sufficient. All right. Let's just take care of this. Can you tell me what happened, son?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I was up in the crow's nest and suddenly it--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? "Suddenly it's-- oh my god. Thank you!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: While you were up the crow's nest, what happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was catching fire! I was trying to put it out, but it just kept growing and growing and I "could feel the heat, and it was--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks fine up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know, I don't--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What did you-- what was the last 24 hours for you? What did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean like, I don't-- oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) I may have left some of the fruit that we picked up in our last stop in the kitchen. I don't know what you've been eating for the last-- that's maybe my fault. I really hope it isn't, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was sudden and it was intense, and then it was "gone! It's fucking crazy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be worried-- I'm going to check to make sure I've got all this, just in case, because that sounds awfully familiar. Do you need a drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Come on. We're going to bring you back, it's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) He stands up and like he's leaning on you for support, but once he gets to his foot, it's fine and he's like, "Oh, man!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Poor guy. Come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You lead him over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm bringing back-- I'm going to just sort of-- yeah. Bring him back, and then tell everybody.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of the port guard are like going through the ship now, and they're going through--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm definitely going to tell everyone my fruit theory, because I'm down a fruit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, shall we, you know, turn in for the night? Seems like it's been a crazy one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm tired.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's very stern for Charlie Adler.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll all pile into one room before we separate for the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You all gather into one of the chambers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We kind of stagger a bit, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we look around the room and make sure nobody can spy on us? Look for peepholes in the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look for invisible peoples in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do the same.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or how about--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking fuck! Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lucky seven!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you have a spell you can cast that solves this problem?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room seems fairly secure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That what? Detects a problem?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That keeps sound in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd you find?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got a book. Well, I don't have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a book. Nott found it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can any of you read this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, first--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look over his shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It has some sketches in it. The language appears to be some sort of either a cipher or a personal shorthand. What languages do you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wherever they are. Celestial, Common, Sylvan. With my experience tinkering with Comprehend Languages, would I believe this is something I could--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. All right. I begin casting the ritual spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know Deep Speech.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was it hidden, where you found it? Should we detect to see if it has magic anyway, like a trace on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was hidden behind a panel, like a false panel in the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you just bring everything out really quickly, I'll cast Detect Magic on there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, nice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just empty your pockets. Let's just make sure nobody's following this stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It'll take me 11 minutes to be able to read this if I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll cast Detect Magic in the meantime.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's these jewels, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we were looking for letters and words and stuff, we ended up breaking her desk and we stole a bunch of jewels--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not as lo-fi as we were discussing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, and then the room filled with poison and then we put a hole in the floor and we fell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we caused another guard to stab someone, and another guard to jump to his death.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We saw them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nah, he's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we jumped in the water and we got away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is, though, Avantika's going to definitely know that somebody stole her stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we can turn this problem into a "proble-tunity", and we can take these jewels that she will definitely know came from her, and plant them on someone else to just sort of-- we could plant them on this Allison person who she doesn't like already!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She is a bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or maybe on one of her own crew, and have them killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well, isn't Allison not cool with Avantika, and the enemy of my enemy is my friend, right? So why would we want to get Allison in trouble?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could plant them on someone that we don't like?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: But who?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about Jamedi Cosko? I don't like that guy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like Jamedi; I thought he was nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we just hold onto them for now. They came in containers, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't want to hold on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we hold on and Avantika's like "Let's everybody empty their pockets" and we have them!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, these are hot rocks here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they just gems, or are they specific pieces of jewelry?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're literally looking at them right now, and I Detected Magic before we opened the boxes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You open the boxes. They're a series of gems, some rougher and probably been scrounged up and found that are with some scrapes, imperfect but still valuable. Maybe three of them that are still well cut and have not been given any abrasions. There is a dull green jade necklace that does emit a minor magical essence to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That one's got a little bit of tingle to it. I'd be worried about that one. Why don't you take a look at that really quickly?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is not listening to anyone. He is sprinkling pinches of salt and soot in a circle around the book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That book's not worth its circle of salt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could destroy these gems and smash them up into smaller gems.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you're going to plant them on anybody, Vera would be a good candidate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vera? Why do you think Vera?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, because she's a bitch. We got to get her out of here. She's, you know, wants my job.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Isn't that just because you stole her job? That seems like a legitimate beef.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think she's in love with Avantika, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because she pulled me aside and she was like, "I don't like Fjord and I'll kill him if you "want me to."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She said she's going to kill him?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception check. Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check. Make a deception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pretty low, so what do you got?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can tell that she's lying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so maybe she didn't say that. But I still don't think she likes Fjord very much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then we should roast her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're definitely going to plant it on her. Cause some commotion at the top. Caleb, what do you got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (mutters)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it hasn't been time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say by now, you've completed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's up to you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. So you can respond.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (poof) All the soot and salt ignites, and then suddenly, whoa! What's it say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go through it, it's hard to follow since it's shorthand, like it's broken sentences and it's pieces. They look to be notes from dreams.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That could be good stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasp) Yes, yes it could!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got the apricot tree!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Caleb would, seeing this play out as he reads, would explain it all very carefully, and delicately, because he knows how conflicted a subject, how charged a subject it would be for Fjord. But does tell everyone in the room everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then discusses the search for Vandren. For months and months, to no avail. Eventually changing focus, to instead continue to improve the joyous boons, and earn the yellow light of the eye. More dreams, with patterns of figures in her way. People that were close to her, that she felt were barricades, chains that held her back, and getting rid of them. You're not entirely certain what "getting rid of them" means, but at least out of the path. Finding others that begin to also learn of the joys and the promise of ruling the sea and how, no matter how much Darktow is the center of the Revelry, and the power of the Plank King, who can possibly not choose to bend the knee to those who control the oceans they sail on. It then goes on to talk about other notes and scavenged bits, talking about the finding of Urukaxl. Of the difficulties in hiring people that would go there. The hiring of Jamedi to search out finally, over time. You find some other notes about another location, from another dream she had, that involves three land masses of different shapes. There's a few notes and questions around it, but one of them is saying, "Archipelago?" Seems to mark these as a possible--

lines.text: Nah.

lines.text: Perhaps this one will be more useful than Vandren."

If we go to one and she goes to the other, and let's say she gets deferred adjudication and gets out just a little bit after us, she might be waiting for us at one or the other. I'm just saying.

lines.text: All right.

lines.text: Do I get advantage still, if this was last night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it only lasts for an hour.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Looking around, no. The room is shoddy in some ways, but it doesn't have large holes you can hide gems in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in the haversack. It's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but if I get searched--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's in the safe, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in the safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lead should block it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and you don't think she's going to go, "Open this safe?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't pull the safe unless she knows it's in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If she turns the bag over and empties it out, everything comes out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you turn the bag inside out--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything comes out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Okay. This was last night. I was looking for a place to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice comes to the room and goes, "Hey! Wake up!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's going on, man? Hey. Good morning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus and I will open the door to our room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You see Bouldergut out there with one of the guards and Willow Whisk, who's the cook. Jeremiah, who's rubbing his eyes. Bouldergut goes, "All hands on deck."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Company meeting."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Let us get our shit together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go get dressed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll grab my stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grabbing our stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes to the next door, says the same thing through the doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All hands on deck! Company meeting!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the deck of the ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah. Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Aye aye. We'll see you there in, what, a couple hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pets you on the head a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Eh heh heh." Goes to every room and says the same deal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, what are we going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does the hallway look like that all the rooms are in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a long hallway; series of chambers, most of the doors closed. Looks to be four and four, and there's a stairway that leads up to a third level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want me to throw it on the roof?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we send Frumpkin now with the package? Just send him now, out the window.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right this very minute, he's a one-ounce owl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He needs to change.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does that take?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got ten minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go! Go. Go, go, go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stall for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the jewels? Should we get rid of the jewels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The whole thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Send it with the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The next minute goes by, and two more figures show up and they go, "We're going to the "ship now, gather your things. There's no more waiting. Come on."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll do it on the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to get dressed, that's all. That's the thing

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get a sense from the vocality here that things are not right. Probably relating to events that transpired through the evening.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gee, I wonder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could just pop out of the room and meet us on the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well yeah, they're not in the room. Do you want to pop out of the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pop out of the room that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean Jester pops out of the room with the bag and leave it somewhere, then meet us on the way to the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh that. The haversack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dimension door the fuck out of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well what are we doing with the book and stuff?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, all of your doors now are being held open and they're expectantly waiting. The crew doesn't trust you, and they haven't really since you've been here. They're not like, "Cool, "guys, let's go!" There's very much a, "We're getting everybody in there and shit, there's going "to be conversations."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no time. We're going down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's being brought over towards the docks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to sleight of hand throw the bag down an alley as we walk?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The whole bag?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oof.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got to get rid of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've gotta get rid of it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'd rather fight over it than lose a check, just going like, "Uh!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm super fast.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Do what you're going to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to lose the whole haversack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do what you've got to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope. It's got the Dodecahedron in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just toss it, and then we'll come back for it. Behind a dumpster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nope! TALIESIN. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys at this point have been brought to the docks now, and you're being pushed toward the direction-- You can see the Squalleater there waiting, and there a number of figures already on deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there ever a moment it looks like nobody's looking at us, or me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know. You don't see anybody, necessarily. You have Bouldergut walking behind you, and other people are being ushered in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I fall back and talk to Bouldergut?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bouldergut, what is going on right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I wanted to sleep longer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too! Everybody seems so angry at everybody else. Look at the ship right now! It looks crazy, all these people walking around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know, I want to just eat breakfast."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me too! While I'm talking to her and hopefully when I point at the ship-- Does she look where I point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look, it's a space shuttle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dumb as a brick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, just follows your eyeline over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I reach in the bag and I pull out the jewels and I dump them off the side. I want them to fall in the water as we're walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so all the jewels (bubble noises) into the water. Okay. Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) I wish I had looked at the Dodecahedron this morning. (normal voice) 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay. You drop them off the side. As far as you're concerned, no one noticed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who else was walking with us besides Bouldergut?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bouldergut was in the back, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bouldergut was in the back, and there were a few other-- First off, you have Waldok, Zoen are with you guys. Bark you see being brought over from another side as well. It looks like he either stayed somewhere else or was somewhere else when he was gathered up by the crew and the guard. The guard only-- None of them go on the ship, but they lead you over to the edge of the dock and watch you all go onto the deck and begin to walk away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the book right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's in Caleb's possession isn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys walk along the plank up onto the deck and there you see Avantika, Vera, the rest of the crew, are all there. You can see the crew of the Mistake are brought to the edge of the dock, and are held there, waiting. You guys are brought up on there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the Mistake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't see it when you came in. There are probably 20-plus ships that are all across the docks here. As you guys are brought to the edge of the ship--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am burning so many calories right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm dying. I've never felt more in trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to get this book off the fucking boat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're on the deck right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the most sure way to get it seen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, to be perfectly honest, a break-in to my "personal chambers."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Did you see anything in particular?" He's like, "I mean, it was crazy! It caught fire, and then I "jumped to get away from it, and there was no fire." She goes, "So it appears that there may "have been some sort of distraction. Well, has anybody else seen anything of particular interest "last night? And by the way, Caduceus, I heard that you were very helpful in helping our compatriots "with their wounds."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it was no problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate you being a team player."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it looked-- That leg was pretty rough. Hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this a frequent occurrence when you're in Darktow? This sort of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, certainly not. To be perfectly honest, whoever did this does not understand the rules of "the city very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can-- No. I can find creatures. I can't find objects.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. Vera?" Vera's sitting back there and nods. You see her fingers trace this weird symbol in the air that leaves a slight trace. Her eyes flare for a second and she goes, "But that is "okay. Because I can."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a bit of phosphorus and squelch it through my hand and cast Wall of Fire across the entire length of the boat between them and us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The gauntlet has been thrown!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sweating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next week we pick up in the shipyard of Darktow, on the deck--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not next week!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god, in two weeks! Oh, no! Curse you, Thanksgiving! On the deck of the Squalleater!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like the salt on the rim of a margarita, phosphorus through my hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's worth its weight in salt?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: LAURA Ho-ly dang. I should have kept those jewels!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flawless plan, executed flawlessly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a pretty good plan. There were just a couple of loose ends!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should have worked out Frumpkin in advance.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought we'd have time in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were a few moments to possibly discard a couple of key objects.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we got the information we needed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is good, but you got the information you needed, and this is going to be a hell of a start to the next session! Oh, man! I wasn't expecting it to go this way!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Info is golden.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll pick up here in a couple of weeks. We're sad we won't see you guys next week for Thanksgiving. What do we have going on over Thanksgiving?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well the day after Thanksgiving on Friday is Honey Heist 3: Tova's Honeys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. We're sad we'll be missing you on Thursday, but on Friday we do have that awesome.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On Friday, watch us as bears? Stealing honey instead of very invaluable books and jewels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can only go better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) It can only be better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh man. My heart's pumping.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The last ten minutes have been like, "Don't cast it. Just wait. Just wait. Just wait. Okay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It felt like getting called into the principal's office. You're like, "Fuck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And like, a principal that always knows when you're lying.

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have video, man. I didn't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, see you guys in a couple of weeks to pick up from this crazy moment. Until then, thank you, we love you very much, and is it Thursday yet? Goodnight, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to war! [music]
